DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy drospirenone dysmenorrhea .
DOC.brief_title: SH T00186 Phase II/ III Optimal Drospirenone ( DRSP ) Dose Finding Placebo-controlled Comparative Study
DOC.criteria: Patients age 20 year old obtain informed consent Patients normal menstrual cycle ( 28+/3 day ) late two menses final enrollment Patients total dysmenorrhea score least 3 point two menstrual cycle final enrollment Patients ovarian chocolate cyst symptomatic uterine fibroid ( define great detail study protocol ) Patients estrogendependent tumor ( e.g . breast cancer , cancer uterine body breast fibrocystic , etc . ) , patient cervical cancer suspect cervical cancer ( e.g . class III great cervical smear endometrial smear examination . ) Patients undiagnosed abnormal vaginal bleeding Patients thrombophlebitis , pulmonary embolism , cerebrovascular disease ( include transient ischemic attack , etc . ) , coronary artery disease ( e.g . myocardial infarction angina pectoris , etc . ) , history disease Patients age 35 year old smoke least 15 cigarette per day Patients migraine accompany prodrome ( e.g . scintillate scotoma starshaped scintillation ) Patients pulmonary hypertension valvular heart disease complicate atrial fibrillation , patient history subacute bacterial endocarditis Patients regularly take nutritional product contain St. John 's Wort Patients underwent surgical treatment endometriosis laparotomy , laparoscopy within 2 month prior screen Patients need use analgesic regularly therapeutic objective relief pain dysmenorrhea study ( occasional use permit )
